name: aurora-veil
caption: Aurora Veil

effect.short: Reduces damage five turns, but must be used during hail.
effect.full:
Places the Aurora Veil effect on the user's side of the field for the next 5 turns.  If the weather is not []{move:hail}, or the weather is disabled by the effects of []{ability:cloud-nine} or []{ability:air-lock}, this move will fail.

Any [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage} dealt to an affected Pokémon is reduced by ½.  (If there are multiple Pokémon on the affected field, the reduction is ⅓.)

flavorText:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.
